text: The men's freestyle 60 kilograms is a competition featured at the 2002 World Wrestling Championships, and was held at the Azadi Indoor Stadium in Tehran, Iran from 6 to 7 September 2002. ==Medalists== {|class="wikitable" |- |bgcolor="gold"|Gold|| |- |bgcolor="silver"|Silver|| |- |bgcolor="#cc9966"|Bronze|| |} * Harun Doğan of Turkey originally won the gold medal, but was disqualified after he tested positive for Ephedrine. ==Results== ===Preliminary round=== ====Pool 1==== ====Pool 2==== ====Pool 3==== ====Pool 4==== ====Pool 5==== ====Pool 6==== ====Pool 7==== ====Pool 8==== ====Pool 9==== ===Knockout round=== ==References== Men's freestyle 60 kg
title: 2002 World Wrestling Championships – Men's freestyle 60 kg
